step1_alert_msg: Go to the Official Accounts backend (https://developers.weixin.qq.com/console/product), select 'Service Account' under 'My Business and Services' in the top-left corner, and obtain developer information in 'Basic Information'.
app_name_placeholder: Please enter your official account name
ip_whitelist_label: Add the following IP addresses to the Official Account IP whitelist
step2_alert_msg: Go to the Official Accounts backend (https://developers.weixin.qq.com/console/product), configure and enable the server configuration in 【Basic Information - Domain and Message Push Configuration - Message Push】. Please configure according to the image below
app_name_required: Please enter your official account name
